TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CacheItemPriority extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the relative priority of items stored in the object.

span.span: Specifies the relative priority of items stored in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wenn der Webserver hostet eine ASP.NET-Anwendung auf Arbeitsspeicher knapp wird die Objekt löscht selektiv Elemente, um Systemspeicher freizugeben.When the Web server hosting an ASP.NET application runs low on memory, the object selectively purges items to free system memory. Wenn ein Element mit dem Cache hinzugefügt wird, können Sie eine relative Priorität im Vergleich zu den anderen Elementen im Cache gespeicherten zuweisen.When an item is added to the cache, you can assign it a relative priority compared to the other items stored in the cache. Elemente, die Sie höheren Priorität zuweisen, die Werte sind weniger wahrscheinlich, dass Sie aus dem Cache gelöscht werden, wenn der Server eine große Anzahl von Anforderungen verarbeitet, während Elemente, die die niedrigere Prioritätswerte zugewiesen sind, um wahrscheinlicher gelöscht werden soll.Items to which you assign higher priority values are less likely to be deleted from the cache when the server is processing a large number of requests, whereas items to which you assign lower priority values are more likely to be deleted. Der Standardwert ist Normal.The default is Normal. > [!NOTE] > Artikel können immer aus dem Cache programmgesteuert, unabhängig von deren Cachepriorität entfernt werden.Items can always be removed from the cache programmatically, regardless of their cache priority. ## Examples Im folgenden Codebeispiel wird mit der Methode zum Hinzufügen eines Elements auf der -Objekt mit dessen `priority` Parameter auf "High" festgelegt.The following code example uses the method to add an item to the object with its `priority` parameter set to High. [!code-aspx-csharp[CacheItemPriority Syntax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheItemPriority Syntax/CS/CacheItemPrioritycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CacheItemPriority Syntax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CacheItemPriority Syntax/VB/CacheItemPriorityvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority AboveNormal = int32(4)

summary.span: Cache items with this priority level are less likely to be deleted as the server frees system memory than those assigned a priority.

span.span: Cache items with this priority level are less likely to be deleted as the server frees system memory than those assigned a priority.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority BelowNormal = int32(2)

summary.span: Cache items with this priority level are more likely to be deleted from the cache as the server frees system memory than items assigned a priority.

span.span: Cache items with this priority level are more likely to be deleted from the cache as the server frees system memory than items assigned a priority.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority Default = int32(3)

summary.span: The default value for a cached item's priority is .

span.span: The default value for a cached item's priority is .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority High = int32(5)

summary.span: Cache items with this priority level are the least likely to be deleted from the cache as the server frees system memory.

span.span: Cache items with this priority level are the least likely to be deleted from the cache as the server frees system memory.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority Low = int32(1)

summary.span: Cache items with this priority level are the most likely to be deleted from the cache as the server frees system memory.

span.span: Cache items with this priority level are the most likely to be deleted from the cache as the server frees system memory.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority Normal = int32(3)

summary.span: Cache items with this priority level are likely to be deleted from the cache as the server frees system memory only after those items with or priority.

span.span: Cache items with this priority level are likely to be deleted from the cache as the server frees system memory only after those items with or priority.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority NotRemovable = int32(6)

summary.span: The cache items with this priority level will not be automatically deleted from the cache as the server frees system memory.

span.span: The cache items with this priority level will not be automatically deleted from the cache as the server frees system memory.

summary.span: However, items with this priority level are removed along with other items according to the item's absolute or sliding expiration time.

span.span: However, items with this priority level are removed along with other items according to the item's absolute or sliding expiration time.
